definition[0]: if you are gazumped, the person who is selling you a house sells it to another person who offers them more money
example[0]: We were gazumped at the last minute.
definition[1]: if you are gazumped, someone who has agreed to sell you a house at an agreed price sells it to someone else for more money
example[1]: If any client of our agency is gazumped, we refund him or her the cost of the valuation fee.
